alert.note: Alert for Wake (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 27 at 5:18PM EDT until May 27 at 6:00PM EDT by NWS Raleigh
info.description: The National Weather Service in Raleigh has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Central Wake County in central North Carolina... * Until 600 PM EDT. * At 518 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Garner, or near Cary, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Raleigh, Cary, Garner, Apex, Knightdale, Wendell, Lake Wheeler and Lake Benson. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
